languages.text:
This webber's area attacks cost 1 AP.
If a target is immobilised by this weapon's single shot, it must pass an Agility resistance test with a +20 bonus or suffer cannot attack for 1 round.

traits.locale_text:
This webber's area attacks cost 1 AP.
If a target is immobilised by this weapon's single shoty, they must pass an Agility resistance test with a +20 bonus or suffer cannot attack for 1 round.

languages.text:
This webber's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} cost 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
If this weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilises{/g} a target, it must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Атаки этим сетеметом {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}по области{/g} требуют 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.
Если {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночный выстрел{/g} этим оружием {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживает{/g} цель, она выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} с бонусом +20 и в случае провала становится {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}неспособной атаковать{/g} в течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
This webber's area attacks cost 1 AP.
If a target is immobilised by this weapon's single shot, it must pass an Agility resistance test with a +20 bonus or suffer cannot attack for 1 round.

If this weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilises{/g} a target, it must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

This webber's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} cost 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
If this weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilises{/g} a target, it must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text:
Bu ağdolayanın {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırıları{/g} 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcar.
Bu silahın {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}tek atış{/g} saldırısı bir hedefi {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} ederse o hedef, +20 bonusa sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}saldıramaz{/g}.
languages.original_text:
This webber's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} cost 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
If this weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilises{/g} a target, it must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Bu ağdolayanın alan saldırıları 1 EP harcar.
Bu silahın tek atış saldırısı bir hedefi felç ederse o hedef, +20 bonusa sahip bir Çeviklik direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde 1 rauntluğuna saldıramaz.

Bu ağdolayanın alan saldırıları 1 EP harcar.
Bu silahın tek atış saldırısı bir hedefi felç ederse o hedef, +20 bonusa sahip bir Çeviklik direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde 1 rauntluğuna saldıramaz.

languages.text:
Los {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} de este lanzarredes cuestan 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
Si el ataque de un {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}solo disparo{/g} de esta arma {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmoviliza{/g} a un objetivo, deberá superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una bonificación de +20 para no sufrir el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}no puede atacar{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text:
This webber's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} cost 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
If this weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilises{/g} a target, it must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Los ataques de área de este lanzarredes cuestan 1 PA.
Si el ataque de un solo disparo de esta arma inmoviliza a un objetivo, deberá superar una prueba de fortaleza de Agilidad con una bonificación de +20 para no sufrir el efecto no puede atacar durante 1 asalto.

Los {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} de este lanzarredes cuestan 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
Si el ataque de un {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}solo disparo{/g} de esta arma {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmoviliza{/g} a un objetivo, deberá superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una bonificación de +20 para no sufrir el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}no puede atacar{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text:
这把捕网枪的{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}消耗1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
如果这把武器的{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}单发射击{/g}将目标{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}，则受影响的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中获得+20加值。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}无法攻击{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text:
This webber's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} cost 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
If this weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilises{/g} a target, it must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
这把捕网枪的范围攻击消耗1点行动点数。
如果这把武器的单发攻击将目标定身，则受影响的目标需要进行敏捷抗性检定，且在此次检定中获得+20加值。若未能通过检定，则会陷入无法攻击状态，持续一轮。

languages.text:
Les {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} de ce lance-toile coûtent 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
Si l'attaque {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}au coup par coup{/g} de cette arme {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilise{/g} une cible, cette dernière doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec un bonus de +20, sous peine de {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}ne plus pouvoir attaquer{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text:
This webber's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} cost 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
If this weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilises{/g} a target, it must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Les attaques de zone de ce lance-toile coûtent 1 PA.
Si l'attaque au coup par coup de cette arme immobilise une cible, cette dernière doit réussir un test de résistance d'Agilité avec un bonus de +20, sous peine de ne plus pouvoir attaquer pendant 1 round.

languages.text:
このウェバーの{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}コストは1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}。
その{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}単体攻撃{/g}によってターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になった場合、+20ボーナスで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}攻撃不可{/g}となる。
languages.original_text:
This webber's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} cost 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
If this weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilises{/g} a target, it must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
このウェバーの範囲攻撃コストは1AP。
その単体攻撃によってターゲットが移動不可になった場合、+20ボーナスで敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると1ラウンドの間攻撃不可となる。

このウェバーの範囲攻撃コストは1AP。
その単体攻撃によってターゲットが移動不可になった場合、+20ボーナスで敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると1ラウンドの間攻撃不可となる。

languages.text:
Die {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} dieses Webers kosten 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschuss{/g}-Angriff dieser Waffe das Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}lähmt{/g}, muss es eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} mit einem Bonus von +20 Bonus bestehen. Misslingt die Probe, kann das Ziel 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}nicht angreifen{/g}.
languages.original_text:
This webber's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} cost 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
If this weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilises{/g} a target, it must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Die Flächenangriffe dieses Webers kosten 1 AP.
Wenn der Einzelschuss-Angriff dieser Waffe das Ziel lähmt, muss es eine Widerstandsprobe auf Beweglichkeit mit einem Bonus von +20 Bonus bestehen. Misslingt die Probe, kann das Ziel 1 Runde lang nicht angreifen.

Die {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} dieses Webers kosten 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschuss{/g}-Angriff dieser Waffe das Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}lähmt{/g}, muss es eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} mit einem Bonus von +20 Bonus bestehen. Misslingt die Probe, kann das Ziel 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}nicht angreifen{/g}.

languages.text:
Атаки этим сетеметом {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}по области{/g} требуют 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.
Если {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночный выстрел{/g} этим оружием {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживает{/g} цель, она выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} с бонусом +20 и в случае провала становится {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}неспособной атаковать{/g} в течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.
languages.original_text:
This webber's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} cost 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
If this weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilises{/g} a target, it must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Атаки этим сетеметом по области требуют 1 ОД.
Если одиночный выстрел этим оружием обездвиживает цель, она выполняет проверку Ловкости на сопротивление с бонусом +20 и в случае провала становится неспособной атаковать в течение 1 раунда.

Атаки этим сетеметом по области требуют 1 ОД.
Если одиночный выстрел этим оружием обездвиживает цель, она выполняет проверку Ловкости на сопротивление с бонусом +20 и в случае провала становится неспособной атаковать в течение 1 раунда.
